MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the LL55 postcode area of Caernarfon, affecting properties in Caeathro and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  9:35AM.  Our engineers on site needed to isolate the power to other properties in the area due to a secondary fault found on the overhead line network and we now expect the power to be restored by 8PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:30PM on 10th March 2021
